nodes.text:
The Histories of Thuruht were a group of stone carving's in the Thuruht
Killik hive, the oldest of the hives which was employed by the ancient and mysterious Celestial's to build mechanical wonders like Centerpoint Station and Sinkhole Station. Each described some rare occurrence of nature in the past or present, along with the origins of the dark side entity Abeloth.
List of Carvings regarding the Celestials
